game.description: The village of Oakwood is plagued by a group of bandits who have taken over the local mine. The villagers are too afraid to enter the mine and need someone brave to clear it out.
game.objective: Clear the Oakwood Mine of bandits

tasks.description: Enter the Oakwood Mine and gather information about the bandit's layout
Take out the bandit leader, Grimgold Ironfist
Clear the mine of any remaining bandits and return to Thorne for reward

game.title: Clearing the Oakwood Mine
